titles.title: Thine be the glory, risen, conqu’ring Son

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thine be the glory, risen, conqu’ring Son, Endless is the vict’ry Thou o’er death hast won.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thine be the glory, risen, conqu’ring Son, Endless is the vict’ry Thou o’er death hast won.{/lang-eng}
